title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: The search results are not getting selected in the external jar Build 200201151, when searching for references to the field. The issue occurs when method getTempDir() is used.
OB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the method getTempDir(), the search results are not getting selected in the external jar Build 200201151.
EB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the method getTempDir(), you should get 3 matches.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have source for rt.jar). 2. Open java.io.File. 3. Use the search functionality to search for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the method getTempDir(). 4. Verify that the search results are not getting selected in the external jar Build 200201151.
